SELECT A.REST_RNO , A.REST_NAME , A.REST_TYPE , A.REST_ADRESS , A.REST_GRADE , B.TYPE_NAME , A.LOW_PRICE , A.HIGH_PRICE , A.TAKEOUT_COL , to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') NOW_DATE FROM FOODELTEST A ,FOODELTEST_TYPE B WHERE A.REST_TYPE=B.REST_TYPE
and b.type_name in
#{type}
and a.rest_open < to_char(sysdate,'HH24')
and a.takeout_col = 'Y'
order by ${sortby_col} desc
order by ${lowPrice_col} asc
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/20.0) FROM FROM FOODELTEST A,FOODELTEST_TYPE B, foodeltest_price C

SELECT A.REST_RNO , A.REST_NAME , A.REST_TYPE , A.REST_ADRESS , A.REST_GRADE , B.TYPE_NAME , C.MENU_PRICE , C.TAKEOUT_COL , C.REST_RNO , to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') NOW_DATE FROM FOODELTEST A ,FOODELTEST_TYPE B, foodeltest_price C WHERE A.REST_TYPE=B.REST_TYPE AND A.REST_RNO=C.REST_RNO GROUP BY A.REST_RNO , A.REST_NAME , A.REST_TYPE , A.REST_ADRESS , A.REST_GRADE , B.TYPE_NAME , C.MENU_PRICE , C.TAKEOUT_COL , C.REST_RNO , to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
